uploadInstructions: Select a photo of the plant or insect you want to analyze.
welcomeMessage: Upload or capture a photo of a plant or pest to get an AI-powered health analysis and treatment suggestions.
analyzingSubtext: Analyzing plant health or identifying pests.
analysisFailedBody: Analysis could not be completed. This might be due to a network issue or an unexpected problem with the AI service. Please check your connection and try again.
notAPlantError: The uploaded image does not appear to contain a plant or agricultural pest. Please ensure you photograph the subject according to the instructions.
artificialPlantError: The uploaded image appears to be of an artificial or fake plant. This tool is designed for analyzing real plants.
serviceUnavailableError: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
translationFailedBody: Failed to translate the analysis. Please check your network connection and try again.
imageReadyMessage: Click the "Analyze Plant" button to begin.
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the selected analyses? This action cannot be undone.
weatherErrorBody: We were unable to determine your location via GPS. You can type the location in the search box.
geolocationPermissionDenied: Location access was denied. Please check your browser and system settings. You can also search for a city manually.
geolocationPositionUnavailable: Your location could not be determined. Please try again or search for a city manually.
geolocationTimeout: The request for your location timed out. Please try again or search for a city manually.
iosInstallBody: Tap the 'Share' icon in your browser, then scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.
installModalBody: For the best experience, add Dr Plant to your home screen for quick access and offline features.
tipFocus: Focus on one affected leaf or the insect.
tipClarity: Ensure the image is sharp, not blurry.
howToUseStep1Desc: Tap 'Upload from Device' to select a photo from your gallery, or tap 'Use Camera' to take a new one. Follow the photo tips for the best results.
howToUseStep2Desc: Once your image is loaded, tap the 'Analyze Plant' button. The AI will examine the photo to identify any issues.
howToUseStep3Desc: Review the detailed report, including the diagnosis, severity level, and tailored treatment recommendations for Jordan.
howToUseStep4Desc: All your analyses are automatically saved. You can revisit, download, or delete them from the history panel at any time.
howToUseStep5Desc: Click the cloud icon in the header to get real-time weather conditions and a 3-day forecast, helping you better care for your plants.
howToUseStep6Desc: Click the seedling icon to receive expert agricultural suggestions tailored to your region and the current season, for both crops and ornamental plants.
howToUseStep7Desc: Use the switches in the header to toggle between light and dark themes or change the application language for your comfort and preference.
updateAvailableBody: A new version of Dr Plant is available.
